title: CLDF dataset derived from Lieberherr and Bodt's "Comparative Wordlists of Kho-Bwa" from 2017
citation: Lieberherr, Ismail and Bodt, Timotheus Adrianus (2017): Sub-grouping Kho-Bwa based on shared core vocabulary. Himalayan Linguistics 16(2). 26-63. URL: https://escholarship.org/uc/item/4t27h5fg
